        public ContentLoader()

    • Method Detail

      • loadPage

        public static void loadPage(ContentSource contentSource,
                            Chapter chapter,
                            int page,
                            ReaderController readerController,
                            boolean preloading)
        Start a thread for loading a chapter page.
        Parameters:
        contentSource - the ContentSource to load from
        chapter - the Chapter the page is from
        page - the 0-indexed page number
        readerController - the ReaderController to update before/after the page is loaded
        preloading - whether the page is being preloaded or not (loaded before the user actually gets to the page)

      • loadSeries

        public static void loadSeries(ContentSource contentSource,
                              java.lang.String source,
                              LibraryController libraryController)
        Start a thread for loading a series.
        Parameters:
        contentSource - the ContentSource to load from
        source - the source for the series, relative to the ContentSource domain
        libraryController - the LibraryController to update before/after the series is loaded

      • reloadSeries

        public static void reloadSeries(ContentSource contentSource,
                                Series series,
                                SeriesController seriesController)
        Start a thread for reloading an existing series.
        Parameters:
        contentSource - the ContentSource to load from
        series - the series to reload
        seriesController - the SeriesController to update before/after the series is reloaded

      • search

        public static void search(ContentSource contentSource,
                          java.lang.String query,
                          SearchSeriesController searchSeriesController)
        Start a thread for searching for series'.
        Parameters:
        contentSource - the ContentSource to load from
        query - the text to search for
        searchSeriesController - the SearchSeriesController to update before/after the results are loaded

      • loadCover

        public static void loadCover(ContentSource contentSource,
                             java.lang.String source,
                             javafx.scene.image.ImageView imageView)
        Start a thread for loading a series' cover image.
        Parameters:
        contentSource - the ContentSource to load from
        source - the absolute source for the image
        imageView - the ImageView to update before/after the cover is loaded

      • startThreadSafely

        private static void startThreadSafely(java.lang.String name,
                                      java.lang.Runnable runnable)
        Start a Runnable in a new Thread while ensuring that the name does not overlap with pre-existing threads.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the Thread to create
        runnable - the Runnable to run in the Thread
